NK073(pu)008:1: // lta ba'i rim pa bshad pa bzhugs /
NK073(pu)008:4: lta ba'i rim pa bshad par bya //
NK073(pu)008:6: gser gyi rdzas ltar gcig las snang //
NK073(pu)008:7: rnam grangs rnam pa lnga gsum gnyis //
NK073(pu)008:8: shes nas gzhag dang blang bar bya //
NK073(pu)008:9: thams cad byang chub snying po'i klong //
NK073(pu)008:11: rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan //
NK073(pu)008:12: rang rgyud rkyen gyis log snang ba //
NK073(pu)008:13: skye bo pa dang mu stegs pa //
NK073(pu)008:14: drug dang rtag chad snang bar byung //
NK073(pu)008:15: dmus long tshul du gyur skye bo bas //
NK073(pu)008:16: tho yor mi ltar brtags snang ba //
NK073(pu)008:17: dmyal ba'i rang sems mi sogs snang //
NK073(pu)008:18: yi dwags sdig sems mi gtsang snang //
NK073(pu)008:19: byol song gyen thur ngam grog snang //
NK073(pu)008:20: mi la mthong yul 'di nyid snang //
NK073(pu)008:21: de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang //
NK073(pu)008:22: lha yi dge sems rin chen snang //
NK073(pu)008:23: cir yang snang phyir mthong mi bden //
NK073(pu)008:24: skye bo rtog pas phrogs pa yis //
NK073(pu)008:25: rnam 'phrul phyi nang lta bur snang //
NK073(pu)008:26: brtags pa brda yi tha snyad shar //
NK073(pu)008:27: rkyen gyis log tshul mu stegs pa //
NK073(pu)008:28: khrid byed drug gi bstan pas bslus //
NK073(pu)008:29: mdor bsdus mu stegs chad pa la //
NK073(pu)008:30: glo bur tsam snang mtha' med de //
NK073(pu)008:31: rtag pa byas snang dngos por 'dod //
NK073(pu)008:32: de yang rgyu min rgyud smra ba //
NK073(pu)008:33: rang bzhin rgyur 'dod dbang phyug rgyu //
NK073(pu)008:34: ngo bo nyid la rgyud smra dang //
NK073(pu)008:35: rdul phran rgyu ru 'dod pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:36: byed po rgyu ru 'dod pa log /
NK073(pu)008:37: gzhan yang mu stegs zhar byung ba //
NK073(pu)008:38: phyi rol pa dang yang dag pa //
NK073(pu)008:39: gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa //
NK073(pu)008:40: gnyis gsum lnga rnams rgyu yi tshul //
NK073(pu)008:41: gsum gnyis 'bras bu'i tshul snang ba //
NK073(pu)008:42: bdag tu 'dzin pa bzhi la lta //
NK073(pu)008:44: cig shos lta ba las 'phags pa //
NK073(pu)008:45: nyan thos rang rgyas mdo sde dang //
NK073(pu)008:46: kri ya u pa yang dag dang //
NK073(pu)008:47: de bzhin yo ga'i theg pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:48: ma h+aa yo ga'i theg pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:49: a nu yo ga'i theg pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:50: a ti yo ga'i theg pa'o //
NK073(pu)008:51: chos tsam lta ba'i nyan thos pas //
NK073(pu)008:52: mdo sde pa dang bye brag gnyis //
NK073(pu)008:53: phyi rol rdul la rtsod byed cing //
NK073(pu)008:54: shes pa skad cig snang bar mthun //
NK073(pu)008:55: de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa pa //
NK073(pu)008:56: phyi rol bcu gnyis sgyu ma tsam //
NK073(pu)008:57: rdul yang phyogs chas ma grub 'phags //
NK073(pu)008:58: shes pa skad cig snang dang thun //
NK073(pu)008:59: mtshan nyid theg pa'ang rnam pa gsum //
NK073(pu)008:60: rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa //
NK073(pu)008:61: de bzhin mdo sde dbu ma pa'o //
NK073(pu)008:62: rnam rig phyi rol tho yor mi //
NK073(pu)008:63: sab mo rta ltar med bzhin du //
NK073(pu)008:65: don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod //
NK073(pu)008:66: rnal 'byor dbu ma kun rdzob mthun //
NK073(pu)008:67: don dam stong pa ma skyes 'dod //
NK073(pu)008:68: mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam //
NK073(pu)008:69: yul rnams logs nas snang bar lta //
NK073(pu)008:70: dam par mtha' gnyis bral ba yi //
NK073(pu)008:72: kri yas don dam chos nyid blta //
NK073(pu)008:73: kun rdzob rang rig yon tan blta //
NK073(pu)008:74: rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snang ba la //
NK073(pu)008:76: gnyis ka rgyud kyi spyod pa ni //
NK073(pu)008:77: lta spyod gong 'og rjes su mthun //
NK073(pu)008:78: yo gas don dam rnam dag pa'i //
NK073(pu)008:79: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su //
NK073(pu)008:80: rtogs pa'i byin rlabs lhar snang ba //
NK073(pu)008:82: ma h+aa yo gas don dam du //
NK073(pu)008:83: rang gnyis med de de bzhin nyid //
NK073(pu)008:84: rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa'i //
NK073(pu)008:85: lhar snang ngang la 'khor ba med //
NK073(pu)008:86: a nu yo gas don dam du //
NK073(pu)008:87: bde chen rtogs pa rig pa'i rtsal //
NK073(pu)008:88: kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor snang //
NK073(pu)008:89: de phyir skye bos brtags pa 'khrul //
NK073(pu)008:90: a ti yo gas bden gnyis bral //
NK073(pu)008:91: thams cad rang byung rang snang ba'i //
NK073(pu)008:92: ye shes mtha' dbus bral ba la //
NK073(pu)008:93: brtags pa gnyis po gdod nas med //
NK073(pu)008:94: de phyir gser la gser mthong ltar //
NK073(pu)008:95: ji bzhin ma nor bden mthong yin //
NK073(pu)008:96: mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas //
NK073(pu)008:97: ji ltar bltas pa der snang phyir //
NK073(pu)008:98: dngos po rtag pa yod min te //
NK073(pu)008:99: yod na kun la mthun snang phyir //
NK073(pu)008:100: de phyir rang sems so sor snang //
NK073(pu)008:101: brtags pa gcig yul gcig yin pas //
NK073(pu)008:102: 'khrul pa snang bar the tshom med //
NK073(pu)008:103: des na spyod yul gdod nas med //
NK073(pu)008:104: rtog sems 'gro ba so so'i sems //
NK073(pu)008:105: gcig na dge sdig rnam smin yang //
NK073(pu)008:106: ma spyad kun gyis myong bar rigs //
NK073(pu)008:107: de min yang dag don mi rung //
NK073(pu)008:108: rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir //
NK073(pu)008:109: gcig min de nyid ma skyes pas //
NK073(pu)008:110: tha dad don du'ang mi rung ste //
NK073(pu)008:111: gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o //
NK073(pu)008:112: dngos po sna tshogs brtags pa yi //
NK073(pu)008:113: ming la grub pa'i gtan tshigs med //
NK073(pu)008:114: de phyir tshan nyid ci yang min //
NK073(pu)008:115: ma grub pa la yod rtogs pa //
NK073(pu)008:116: sgyu ma'i skyes bus shes 'gyur gyi //
NK073(pu)008:117: rgyal ba nyid kyis mi mkhyen no //
NK073(pu)008:118: snang bas spyod yul ma grub phyir //
NK073(pu)008:119: dmigs pa'i shes pa yod mi rung //
NK073(pu)008:120: spyod yul ma skyes ye shes phyir //
NK073(pu)008:121: bsgom bya'i chos nyid logs na med //
NK073(pu)008:122: sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral phyir //
NK073(pu)008:123: sgom pa po yang ga la yod //
NK073(pu)008:124: de ltar sgom mkhan dngos med na //
NK073(pu)008:125: mi gnas mi rtogs 'jog pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:126: nam mkha' lta bu rang gsal ba'o //
NK073(pu)008:127: rang sems yong gis de lta'o //
NK073(pu)008:128: ci yang yid la mi byed na //
NK073(pu)008:129: yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs //
NK073(pu)008:130: lus ngag ma skyes gzhi med phyir //
NK073(pu)008:131: skyil krung smra bcad kha na med //
NK073(pu)008:132: de bzhin sems kyang dngos bral bas //
NK073(pu)008:133: rtogs spang sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong //
NK073(pu)008:134: de ltar rtogs pa sgom pa'o //
NK073(pu)008:135: yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med //
NK073(pu)008:136: ci phyir bdag nyid de phyir bas //
NK073(pu)008:137: rang gi dbyings las g.yos pa med //
NK073(pu)008:138: rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzang dang ngan //
NK073(pu)008:139: ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing //
NK073(pu)008:140: de don dran pas 'bral ba'ang med //
NK073(pu)008:141: rang byung rang zhir nga smra'o //
NK073(pu)008:142: dper na rkun po tshor ma thag /
NK073(pu)008:143: ma spangs 'bros bzhin gdeng gis zhi //
NK073(pu)008:144: lta ba'i shugs las byung ba'i phyir //
NK073(pu)008:145: ched du tshor ba sten mi dgos //
NK073(pu)008:146: de min blo yis skad cig tu //
NK073(pu)008:147: rnam rtog rang gi de nyid blta'o //
NK073(pu)008:148: bying ba shes pa ldang mi nus //
NK073(pu)008:149: rmugs pa don nyid mi gsal ba'o //
NK073(pu)008:150: bying rmugs rab tu bying rmugs dang //
NK073(pu)008:151: shin tu bying rmugs phyir mi btang //
NK073(pu)008:152: de bzhin rgod pa rnam pa gsum //
NK073(pu)008:153: le lo snyoms las dman la sbyor //
NK073(pu)008:154: dogs ba rgol dang lhung ba gnyis //
NK073(pu)008:157: lus kyi bya byed spyod la dga' //
NK073(pu)008:158: ngag gi ca co smra dga' ba //
NK073(pu)008:159: yang dag don las ring ba'i phyir //
NK073(pu)008:160: bya byed grong yul gtam mi glan //
NK073(pu)008:161: sbyin dang cho ga'i las mi bya //
NK073(pu)008:162: dge ba'i las kyang g.yeng 'gyur na //
NK073(pu)008:163: sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos //
NK073(pu)008:164: nyam dang g.yo dang goms pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:165: brtag pa'i nyams dang sbyar bar bya //
NK073(pu)008:166: don du 'di snyam bstan du med //
NK073(pu)008:167: de rtogs yang dag nyams dang ldan //
NK073(pu)008:168: de tshe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod //
NK073(pu)008:169: phyi nang rtags kyang rig par 'byung //
NK073(pu)008:170: skyes kyang dga' brod sems ma skyed //
NK073(pu)008:171: med kyang de la mi dga' med //
NK073(pu)008:172: de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na //
NK073(pu)008:173: rim 'byung gsang na dngos grub myur //
NK073(pu)008:174: klungs gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog la //
NK073(pu)008:176: zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing //
NK073(pu)008:177: snying rje chen po mi 'bral na //
NK073(pu)008:178: chos nyid don dang phrad pa'i rtags //
NK073(pu)008:179: ci spyod don las ma nyams na //
NK073(pu)008:180: goms pas las su rung ba'i rtags //
NK073(pu)008:181: 'di ldan dbang phye btsums med na //
NK073(pu)008:182: snang ba gang yang mi skyon zhing //
NK073(pu)008:183: yid la bya ba med phyir ro //
NK073(pu)008:184: lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang //
NK073(pu)008:185: chos brgyad spong len med pa dang //
NK073(pu)008:186: gang la'ang nyon mongs mi skye na //
NK073(pu)008:187: 'di yang sa lam bgrod pa'i rtags //
NK073(pu)008:188: yid la byed med 'gags snang med //
NK073(pu)008:189: 'du shes ma gzung rang gsal la //
NK073(pu)008:190: gang yang nyams su mi len cing //
NK073(pu)008:191: sems kyi mngon par ma phyogs shing //
NK073(pu)008:192: dmigs med tshul du rang snang ba //
NK073(pu)008:193: tha snyad tsam du bsgom zhes brjod //
NK073(pu)008:194: yang dag don gyi gdeng med par //
NK073(pu)008:195: tshig tsam lta la khungs chung zhing //
NK073(pu)008:196: byar med chos la blo gtad nas //
NK073(pu)008:197: rtsing chos phata ral spyod byed pa //
NK073(pu)008:198: rgyal ba'i bkas kyang mi skyob ste //
NK073(pu)008:199: ya nga'i 'bras bu the tshom med //
NK073(pu)008:200: rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad ldan na //
NK073(pu)008:201: skye bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras //
NK073(pu)008:202: gding med lta ba mtho 'dod pas //
NK073(pu)008:203: rang gi nga rgyal snyems byed pa //
NK073(pu)008:204: ri bos srog chags mnan pa ltar //
NK073(pu)008:205: nam yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung //
NK073(pu)008:206: gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas //
NK073(pu)008:207: yang dag don la mi 'dud par //
NK073(pu)008:208: mi chos zang zing las byed cing //
NK073(pu)008:209: rang dbang yod bzhin dbang med ces //
NK073(pu)008:210: smra zhing gsang don yal 'jog pa //
NK073(pu)008:211: phyi ma gar 'gro brtol med par //
NK073(pu)008:212: gal med le lo'i las byed pa //
NK073(pu)008:213: e ma'o rang 'joms dpa' bo ste //
NK073(pu)008:214: rgya mtsho mjing gi pha bong ltar //
NK073(pu)008:215: thugs rje zhags pa dpyang thag yan //
NK073(pu)008:216: rang gi rang bslus snying re rje //
NK073(pu)008:217: le lo can la thar lam med //
